scripts.dev: rimraf dev-dist && cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* SW_DEV=true vite --force
scripts.run-build-sw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build
scripts.test-custom-sw: cross-env DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa:* BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true vite build && cross-env SW=true vitest run && cross-env SW=true playwright test
scripts.test-generate-sw: nr run-build-sw && vitest run && playwright test
